biotools.summary: Pout2Prot converts Percolator output files to protein group and subgroup files using Occam's razor or anti-Occam's razor. These output files can directly be used in Prophane for further downstream taxonomic and functional analysis

bioschemas.name: Pout2Prot
bioschemas.summary: Pout2Prot converts Percolator output files to protein group and subgroup files using Occam's razor or anti-Occam's razor. These output files can directly be used in Prophane for further downstream taxonomic and functional analysis
